item.title: Thoughts On The CNCF CKA Exam After Passing With 93%
item.description: Last month I passed the CNCF CKA exam. I’ve been postponing the exam date for the better part of the year, assuming that it would be a very difficult exam. From what I’ve read, it used to be a difficult exam up until they broke the exam into two parts: CKA and CKAD. This happened around two years ago. The CKA is supposed to be the more difficult one of the two exams.
